(You have no power in the Destron base, just so you don't do it again, and =
they aren't regular doors, they slide open, you can't shut them, you wouldn=
't know where the button is, and what exactly did he say?)

::Magmatron::

=
      He motioned for the bot to sit down. This guy made everybody nervous,=
 including his own troops, even Cerberus. 
    "Please sit down," He said. =
"What is it that you wish to show me?"
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  Fr=
om: kinger01030@... 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, December=
 12, 2000 8:02 PM
  Subject: Re: Magmatron awakens


  The bot looked up as=
 the voice boomed. "I think my number is up. He walked 
  into the room whe=
re magam was and shut the door behind him. This is for your 
  eyes only we=
 must be alone.

        eGroups Sponsor
